Philip Polkinghorne murder trial live updates: Defence witnesses continue as new details of the case emerge https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-live-updates-defence-witnesses-continue-as-new-details-of-the-case-emerge/F6LTGPPJZZAEXCRPJ2M2THAOSY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/philip-polkinghorne-murder-trial-live-updates-defence-witnesses-continue-as-new-details-of-the-case-emerge/F6LTGPPJZZAEXCRPJ2M2THAOSY/ Craig Kapitan, George BlockPhilip Polkinghorne is accused of strangling his wife, Pauline Hanna. Tue, 03 Sep 2024 00:32:51 +0000 Eye surgeon Philip Polkinghorne shows up at the High Court at Auckland during week three of his murder trial. He is accused of having strangled wife Pauline Hanna in their Remuera home before staging the scene to look like a suicide. Photo / Jason Oxenham
